p: The United States of America Territory of Washington To E.F. Whittier the Sheriff of Spokane County, Washington: Greeting This is to command you, that you have the body of Arthur Powell by you imprisoned and detained as it is said before the District Court of the Territory of Washington for the 4th in Spokane County on the 5th day of May A.D. 1885 then and there to do and receive what shall be ordered concerninghim and have you then and there this writ. Hereof fail not under penalty of the law. By order of the court. Witness the Hon. George Turner Jud. of the 4th Judicial District of the Territory of Washington with the seal of our said court hereunto attached. Kate W. Feauerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy
